availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Livingston R. Thurman (Washington County, Kentucky, student and attorney)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ellen Froman in Washington County, Kentucky, on June 20, 1854. Father of Mariah R. Thurman, Katie Thurman, G. W. Thurman, N. R. Thurman, Isaac Thurman, and Mary L. Thurman. Law student in Washington County in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Washington County in 1850. Attorney in Washington County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Washington County in 1860. Attorney in Washington County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, p. 221.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, p. 553.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield, District 2, p. 88.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield, District 2, p. 472 B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield, p. 418 A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994057, Washington County Marriages, p. 15.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 11, Washington County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 2.
"Livingston Rice Thurman (1831-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial #110213188, accessed September 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110213188.
